name: Fenix HM65R Headlamp
description: This versatile headlamp gives you both flood and spotlighting with independently controlled LEDs. 4 spotlight modes and 3 floodlight modes can be used on their own or together. Read in the tent, work on a job or ride a couple laps with darkness-melting 1400 lumens. The internal battery is easily charged via an integrated USB-C port, or use the lithium 123A batteries when you're away from USB ports.Cast from lightweight magnesium, the body is lighter and has improved cooling over aluminum.7 modes, 4 in spotlight: turbo (2h at 1000 lumens), high (22h at 400 lumens), medium (48h at 130 lumens), low (97h at 50 lumens), 3 in floodlight: high (21h at 400 lumens), medium (50h at 130 lumens and low (300h at 4 lumens).2 lenses and modes: 1 for spot and 1 for flood, each can be used independently or together.Powered by 18650 rechargeable battery or 2 CR123A batteries.Integrated USB-C port charges internal 18650 battery fast.4-level power indicator.2-sided switch controls independent or combined modes.Lockout mode prevents light from being switched on inside your pack.Ratcheting tilt housing tilts up to 60°.Light housing has an integrated partial button cover, protecting the silicone buttons.Perforated, reflective headband wicks away sweat and helps keep you seen.IPX6 waterproofing means your light is ready for any weather.In the box: HM65R, head straps, 18650 ARB-L18-3500 3500mAh battery, spare battery compartment O-ring, USB-C cable, manual and warranty card.
